snippet.title: Gibbous: A Cthulhu Adventure Launch Teaser
snippet.description:
Cthulhu rises August 7th 2019!
Steam: http://gibbousgame.com/steam
GOG: http://gibbousgame.com/gog 

Crazy cultists. Cthulhu. A talking cat. Gibbous takes you on an expansive, traditionally animated, hand-painted adventure. Play as three protagonists and explore a lushly rendered Lovecraft-inspired world, unraveling ancient conspiracies. A comedy cosmic horror adventure made in Transylvania!

Available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Arabic, Romanian, Hungarian

Join our discord: discord.gg/gibbous
Website: http://gibbousgame.com/
